description.originalText: Diane cared for our son starting at 6 months to almost two. She took wonderful care of him and filled their days with fun activities and discovery. They had a really special bond and just had a blast together! If you're looking to hire Diane, you shouldn't hesitate, she is a great caregiver who puts the kids as first priority.

description.displayText: Diane was simply amazing. Our son had the best time with her. He still lights up when she visits. She was dependable, hilarious, and made our lives so much easier. She adapted to our needs as they developed and responded immediately to any feedback we gave.  Any family would be lucky to have her care for their children.
description.originalText: Diane was simply amazing. Our son had the best time with her. He still lights up when she visits. She was dependable, hilarious, and made our lives so much easier. She adapted to our needs as they developed and responded immediately to any feedback we gave.  Any family would be lucky to have her care for their children.

description.displayText:
When I was calling references for Diane, one mother stated it perfectly: "Diane is simply the best." 

Diane has a huge personality, a warm heart and a general joy for life that she brings with her every time she walks through the door. I have hired Diane to take care of my 3-year-old twins on many occasions - first for several weeks as an emergency stop gap while my regular nanny was away - and now regularly for evening babysitting as needed. 

Diane is always punctual, reliable, sends text updates with photos and videos, and will even help out with small tasks like laundry when the girls are asleep.  

I love Diane, but more importantly my girls adore Diane. They are always super excited to see her. She is FUN and constantly engages them in activities, but she also makes sure to teach them good manners and disciplines them appropriately. She helps enforce time outs etc, as needed, but always in a warm and calm way which my girls can process and understand. 

Highly Recommend!!

description.displayText:
We have known Diane T. for 10 years. During this this time, she has been both the full time and part-time sitter for our children, now 10 and 5. Diane welcomed our son L. into her life and always treated him like her own.  When our daughter L. was born, she did the same.

Diane's warmth, smarts, creativity, and genuine caring and sincerity make her a fantastic sitter. She has helped build a solid foundation that our children will carry with them for the rest of his life.  

We are truly grateful to have met Diane and feel that anyone that has the opportunity to meet her will feel the same.  Diane will always be a part of our lives.

Tara R.
